Method Detail

createCriteria

public static Criteria createCriteria(EntityManager entityManager,
                                      Class<?> persistentClass)

Creates a new Criteria query for a entity class.

Please note that the entity name is deduced from the unqualified class name. You should use createCriteria(EntityManager, String) if you have changed the entity name by using the name attribute of the Entity annotation.

Parameters:
entityManager - EntityManager for query creation
persistentClass - persistent class
Returns:
new Criteria query

createCriteria

public static Criteria createCriteria(EntityManager entityManager,
                                      String entityName)

Creates a new Criteria query for a named entity.

Parameters:
entityManager - EntityManager for query creation
entityName - name of the entity
Returns:
new Criteria query

createCriteria

public static Criteria createCriteria(EntityManager entityManager,
                                      Class<?> persistentClass,
                                      String alias)

Creates a new Criteria query for a entity class. Sets the specified alias for the root entity. You may later use this alias to refer to the entity in Criterion, Projection and Order instances.

Please note that the entity name is deduced from the unqualified class name. You should use createCriteria(EntityManager, Class, String) if you have changed the entity name by using the name attribute of the Entity annotation.

Parameters:
entityManager - EntityManager for query creation
persistentClass - persistent class
alias - alias to set for the criteria
Returns:
new Criteria query

createCriteria

public static Criteria createCriteria(EntityManager entityManager,
                                      String entityName,
                                      String alias)

Creates a new Criteria query for a named entity. Sets the specified alias for the root entity. You may later use this alias to refer to the entity in Criterion, Projection and Order instances.

Parameters:
entityManager - EntityManager for query creation
entityName - name of the entity
Returns:
new Criteria query
